author: davsclaus
msg: CAMEL-5681: Fixed recipientlist/multicast so depending on unexpected or exception during routing sets the redelivery exhaust property correctly. And that the doTry .. doCatch will reset the exhaust property to esnure exception is handled like the error handler would do in RedeliveryErrorHandler.

msg: CAMEL-5681: Added tests to reproduce issue
